title: The Best Sephora Gifts, From Stocking Stuffers to Luxury Sets
description: Who has ever been sad to receive a gift from Sephora? Nobody. This holiday season, check everyone off your list with these epic beauty gifts. Whether they're obsessed with the latest makeup trends, meticulous about their skin-care routine, or always stocking up on the newest hair gadgets, there's a gift at Sephora for them. Plus, from now until Nov. 11, the Sephora Savings Event is happening, and if you're a part of the rewards program, you can get up to 20 percent off the entire site and 30 percent off all Sephora Collection items with the code SAVINGS. What are the best Sephora gifts worth buying right now? We asked PS editors to share a few of their favorites. There are great skin-care essentials for all different skin types, luxe lip-care essentials, and even a skin-care set you have to see to believe. Plus, the beauty-lover who already has everything will be so excited to receive a Shark FlexStyle, and the makeup aficionado will love the Refy lip set in their stocking. Still, that's just the beginning. Sephora products have a tendency to sell out, so if you see something you love, don't delay. Take a peek at our picks ahead. Now, if you'll excuse us, we have some shopping to do.
author: Renee Rodriguez
excerpt: Shop the best gifts at Sephora.

Who has ever been sad to receive a gift from Sephora? Nobody. This holiday season, check everyone off your list with these epic beauty gifts. Whether they're obsessed with the latest makeup trends, meticulous about their skin-care routine, or always stocking up on the newest hair gadgets, there's a gift at Sephora for them. Plus, from now until Nov. 11, the Sephora Savings Event is happening, and if you're a part of the rewards program, you can get up to 20 percent off the entire site and 30 percent off all Sephora Collection items with the code SAVINGS.

What are the best Sephora gifts worth buying right now? We asked PS editors to share a few of their favorites. There are great skin-care essentials for all different skin types, luxe lip-care essentials, and even a skin-care set you have to see to believe. Plus, the beauty-lover who already has everything will be so excited to receive a Shark FlexStyle, and the makeup aficionado will love the Refy lip set in their stocking. Still, that's just the beginning. Sephora products have a tendency to sell out, so if you see something you love, don't delay.

Take a peek at our picks ahead. Now, if you'll excuse us, we have some shopping to do.

Best Reusable Eye Masks

Dieux Skin Forever Eye Mask ($25)

"Single-use eye masks are great, but I always feel guilty about using them because they aren't the best for the planet. So I was excited when I was gifted Dieux Skin's environmentally-friendly Forever Eye Mask two years ago. The mask is reusable, helps with better absorption of your eye cream, and doesn't lose its grip on your undereye area (I'm still on my first pair, so they really do last). If you know someone who likes a good at-home spa day, this could be a great addition to their stocking." — Alida Araica, newsletter manager

Best Body Beauty Gift Set

Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Jet Set ($32)

"I gave this body-care set to my bridesmaids as a gift at my bachelorette party, and they all loved it. Now, I plan on gifting it as a stocking stuffer for the holidays. It contains the body cream, perfume, and body wash, all housed in a clear travel case. It smells amazing and leaves your skin feeling ultra-hydrated — a must for the wintertime." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, beauty

Best Mascara Gift Set

Benefit Wild Caught Lashes Kit ($40)

Benefit Wild Caught Lashes Kit ($40)
"There's no bigger trend in food right now than tinned fish and, for me, there's no better category in beauty than mascara. Benefit Cosmetics managed to squeeze the best of both worlds into one cutest-ever holiday set with this Wild Caught Lashes Kit. It includes two of its bestselling formulas — Fan Fest (my personal favorite) and Bad Gal Bang — so the giftee of your choice can "mascara cocktail" to their heart's desire." Kelsey Castañon, senior content director

Best Luxury Hair Styler

Dyson Airwrap ($599)

"If I've said it once, I've said it a million times: I'm obsessed with my Dyson Airwrap. I genuinely don't leave home without it (when I had to be without it in Europe both my hair and my heart suffered) because it's my go-to styling tool for absolutely any look. It's a splurge, but I've had mine for over four years without a single issue." — Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producer

Best Candle

Nest New York Mini Ornament Holiday Candle ($20)

"Candles are always a great gift idea (I say this as the proud owner of a candle cabinet). The Nest New York Mini Ornament Holiday Candle is the cutest stocking stuffer and white elephant present — it's small but feels luxe. With notes of pomegranate, pine, and cloves, it's a great holiday scent without being too Christmas-y, and the glass jar it comes in is so cute that they'll want to reuse it for little things around the house. Plus, it's $20, so you can't beat it." — JH

Best Body Cream Gift Set

Fenty Skin Lil Butta Dropz Mini Whipped Oil Body Cream Trio ($59)

"These butta dropz are the perfect stocking stuffers but also the perfect gift for yourself if you want to try these body creams and don't want to commit to the full size just yet. But once you try them you'll be buying the full size in no time. I'm hooked and use these creams year round. The OG bodycream Fenty Fresh is my go-to. Tip: Use these when you're traveling they're the perfect size!" — JH

Best Blow-Dryer Brush

Ghd Duet Blowdry 2-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush ($399)

"UK Associate Editor and beauty expert Lauren Ezekiel has been using this for months now and genuinely says it's as good as a salon blow-dry, so, like, cost-per-non-blowdry, this is a bit of a steal, right? She says it lasts longer too, adding: 'Hands down, the shine is next level. If like me you long to recreate the just walked out the salon swish at home, then you need to listen up.' Great hair is a gift they'll get every day of the year right?" — Rhiannon Evans, interim content director, UK

Best Hair Styling Gift Set

Dae Social Butterfly Hairstyling Trio Value Set ($48)

"Buying someone hair products can be hard unless you know their hair type and preferences. That said, the Dae Social Butterfly Hairstyling Trio Value Set is pretty versatile and allows the giftee to test out a handful of hero products from a TikTok-viral brand. Inside this gift set is a full-size styling cream, which can be used in a myriad of ways (to hydrate curls, slick back a bun, smooth frizz in a blowout), dry shampoo, and a dual-edge brush." — JH

Best Lip Product Gift Set

Refy Plump Lip Liner and Gloss Collection ($35)

"I have been obsessed with Refy's Blur Lip Liner ever since I tried it for the first time, and the plum color is absolutely stunning. It's currently trending on TikTok, and I totally get why. This gift set comes with a lip liner and a gloss, which makes it the perfect product to give to your makeup-obsessed bestie or to keep for yourself. (I know what I'll be doing!)" — RR

Best Brightening Eye Masks

Topicals, Faded Under Eye Brightening & Clearing Eye Masks ($22)

"Do I wear these eye patches out in public? Yes, yes I do, and I have no shame in doing it. I feel like they're a fashion statement and help with dark circles, so it's basically a 2-in-1 eye patch. I'm also adding them to everyone's stockings this year because they're just that good." — Tasha Dowbachuk, sssociate growth strategist

Best Hair Styler For Curly Hair

Shark FlexStyle Hair Blow Dryer and Multi-Styler ($299)

"Everyone seems to be sporting a blowout these days, and the Shark Flexstyle makes achieving that look so much easier. The beauty tool takes hair from wet and flat to dry and voluminous in no time, thanks to its handy styling attachments. I treated myself to the styler last year after a few (tragic) attempts at achieving a Sabrina Carpenter-esque blowout with a round brush and hair dryer, and it's been a game changer for my thick hair. Anyone who spends far too much time styling their hair would appreciate this gift — or the Dyson Airwrap that's also PS-editor approved." — AA
